About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I like to do!

Always Learning and laying a new brick down everyday.

I grew up in Las Vegas but my family is from San Diego and I have lived here since I was 18. I enjoy surfing, snowboarding, hiking, video games, coding and hanging out with my friends. Ever since I was a kid, I have always enjoyed challenges and learning about how computers work and even building my first PC when I was 10. Once I moved to San Diego, I decided pursuing an education in Computer Science was the best choice for me and I have not looked back! I will be obtaining my Associates Degree this Spring and will be transferring to San Diego State University in the fall. I enjoy learning and would love nothing more than a opportunity to work hard at a internship that I could continue to grow at. Here is a link to my resume, I hope to be in contact with you soon!
